publicationStmt.p: for use by whoever wants it

body.p: Generic TEI Customization starts with modules tei, core, textstructure, header and Xinclude. For publishig work.

moduleRef.include: abbr address analytic author bibl biblScope biblStruct cb cit date desc editor email emph expan foreign gloss graphic head headItem headLabel hi imprint index item l label lb lg list listBibl milestone monogr name note num p pb postBox postCode ptr pubPlace publisher q quote ref resp respStmt series sp speaker stage street term title

elementSpec.desc: Wrapper for fallback elements if an XInclude fails

attDef.desc: Correspondance de mise en forme dans Indesign (à l'échelle du paragraphe).
